desc: Toncha Hardwood is a family-owned solid wood furniture manufacturer making high quality products for residential and commercial spaces. Handmade furniture finished with a food-safe, non-toxic, natural oil finish. Made to order and shipped across Canada and the US.

layout.text: Solid Wood Furniture. Sustainably sourced and handmade locally.
Finished with natural, food-safe finishes that will bring you a closer connection and appreciation for the natural beauty of solid wood.
